chinese: n.苏打水，汽水
english: soda

chinese: 苏打水搭配柠檬和薄荷，十分完美。
english: Soda water is perfectly complemented by lemon and mint

chinese: n.披肩；斗篷；岬，海岬，海角
english: cape

chinese: 那个披着红色斗篷的小男孩看上去真可爱！
english: The little boy looks so cute in that red cape!

chinese: n.奠基者
english: founder

chinese: 他被广泛认为是现代物理学的奠基者。
english: He is widely regarded as the founder of modern physics

chinese: n，特工：技工 adj. 运转着的，从事生产劳动的
english: operative

chinese: 这名特工听到命令后掏出了他的枪。
english: The operative took out his gun after he heard the command

chinese: 压迫；使（心情等）沉重
english: oppress

chinese: 这些可怜的员工受到了他们冷酷的老板的压迫。
english: The poor employees are oppressed by their cruel boss

chinese: n.擦伤 V.刮，擦
english: scrape

chinese: 她正在处理孩子膝盖上的擦伤。
english: She is treating the scrape on the child's knee

chinese: n. 映像
english: reflection

chinese: 猫咪在镜中看到的映像不是它自己，而是一只狮子。
english: The reflection the cat saw in the mirror was not itself, but a lion

chinese: n. 侄女，外甥女
english: niece

chinese: 我的侄女或外甥女就是我兄弟姐妹的女儿。
english: My niece is my sibling's daughter

chinese: 几.胶带；磁带 vt.用胶带粘贴；录音
english: tape

chinese: 在墙上贴胶带可以在刷漆的时候对墙面起到保护作用。
english: You can stick some tape to the wall to protect it while we paint

chinese: n.名声，荣誉 vt.被认为，被称为
english: repute

chinese: 她是一位名声在外的经理，受到团队所有人的尊敬。
english: She is a manager of excellent repute and is respected by all of her team

chinese: 几.着迷；着魔
english: obsession

chinese: 她痴迷于自拍。
english: She has an obsession of taking selfies

chinese: m队形；【地】地层
english: formation

chinese: 大学生们正以整齐的队形行进。
english: The university students are marching in perfect formation

chinese: adv.任何地方都不
english: nowhere

chinese: 他在房间里到处找，但哪里都找不到钥匙。
english: He looked everywhere in the room, but the key was nowhere to be found

chinese: n，开始；攻击，袭击
english: onset

chinese: 裁判的哨声表示比赛开始。
english: The referee's whistle indicates the onset of the game

chinese: n. 歇斯底里
english: hysteria

chinese: 足球场上，人们歇斯底里。
english: There was a wave of mass hysteria on the football field

chinese: 丝枯萎，凋谢；使畏缩
english: wither

chinese: 地里的向日葵在太阳下枯萎了。
english: The sunflowers in the field have withered in the sun
